Name: Hibiscus Red
About the game: Hibiscus Red | Part 1: Voices from beyond In the first part of this new adventure game series Hibiscus discovers the shocking truth about his father and sets out on a journey to save his family and the world. Or is it worlds? Features: Almost classic point and click adventure game Part 1 of 4 with around 40 minutes of gameplay Multi-language support: English and german texts Text-to-speech option for english language. No hint mechanics, so not so easy I guess, yes it's a feature!
